projects.name: The Afflicted
projects.blurb: The Afflicted is a competitive single and multiplayer shooter that blends 3rd person shooter with elements of real time strategy.

projects.name: Blazing Gear  : New Generation of Kart Racing Online (PC)
projects.blurb: Blazing Gears is a new type of online kart racing that will satisfy every type of gamer's needs. It's insanely hot!

projects.name: LAIR - Social Dungeon Crawling
projects.blurb: LAIR isn't just a retro game, it's designed from the ground up to be the last 2D Role Playing Game you'll ever play.

projects.name: Feeding Zombies! game for iPhone
projects.blurb: Awesome single and multiplayer game for iPhone where players are zombies competing to feed on human flesh and Brains!

projects.name: Escape the Crypt movieGame
projects.blurb: Escape the crypt is a film noir/suspense adventure game built off off the Escape the attic game. This game is part film part choose you

projects.name: Lawnmower Challenge - Indie Puzzle Game
projects.blurb: Puzzles. Puzzles! PUZZLES! (and a lawnmower). Sokuban meets Chip's Challenge meets Bobby Carrot

projects.name: Greed: Make History
projects.blurb: An upcoming turn-based strategy game for iOS featuring time manipulation, brain-twisting multiplayer, and a puzzle mode.

projects.name: ROBOTA: Vengeance
projects.blurb: A stunning cross platform game, with in-depth storyline, customizable Ass Kicking Robots & Genetically Modified Dinosaurs

projects.name: The Quest for Queen's English
projects.blurb: It's all about the art of articulation, in this amusing adventure into creative writing.  From De Angelis Enterprises and YOU!

projects.name: 2D point and click retro adventure game with inventory!
projects.blurb: I am building a 2d point and click retro style game, I am working on the art assets as well as the programming myself.

projects.name: Project Towers
projects.blurb: Towers is an indie game in which you find yourself on an unknown planet and must conquer it by capturing and defending towers.

projects.name: BabyChicks iPhone/iPad Game/App
projects.blurb: BabyChicks is a 3D game for iPhone/iPad that allows you to hatch, feed, and play with your customized baby chicks.

projects.name: Meme Defense - a Tower Defense Game
projects.blurb: A tower defense game starring all your favorite internet memes.

projects.name: Urbania: Create the future
projects.blurb: Environmental awareness using social games where players are challenged to pursue sustainable development in the city of the future.

projects.name: Geocaching-The Puzzle Based Cache
projects.blurb: An edutainment tutorial on one way to approach the Puzzle based caches of the real world game Geocaching.

projects.name: De Syria
projects.blurb: De Syria is an Single Player RPG to be designed in the classic Eastern RPG style while incorporating Western RPG aspects.

projects.name: Primary - GPS digital paintball - paint the world
projects.blurb: Primary is digital paintball played using GPS.  Plant digital Colour Pulses and infect your opposition in your team's color.

projects.name: Bandido Loco: A Crowdsourcing App-xperiment
projects.blurb: An experiment to bring together multiple crowdsourced digital works into one cohesive final product: an iPhone game.

projects.name: RAMAYANA - Inspired by true tale
projects.blurb: This is a Side-scrolling Adventure-Action-Puzzle game, placing the human controlled Hero(Rama) against AI-controlled Villain(Ravana).

projects.name: Clockwork and Crossbones
projects.blurb: Turn-based strategy game for Facebook and Kongregate.  Play as James Aleshire as he rescues his pirate crew from Doctor Driftwood.
